CustomField.description: Additional fields to use when querying constituents. Used in conjunction with 'Create Constituent Map', 'Create Interim Map' and 'Match Constituent Map' when additional fields are needed for these. Format is ["Field API Name 1", "Field API Name 2"].
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Additional fields to use when querying constituents. Used in conjunction with 'Create Constituent Map', 'Create Interim Map' and 'Match Constituent Map' when additional fields are needed for these. Format is ["Field API Name 1", "Field API Name 2"].
CustomField.label: Constituent Fields Query Addition
